content: The procedures for issuing the school certificates.

To issue and download certificates, you need to log in and select the certificate issuance service on the home page [doc1]. Then, choose the name of the student for whom the certificate is to be printed. After selecting the student's name, the drop-down list for the academic year appears, so that the user can choose the academic year for the certificate he wishes to issue. By choosing the academic year, data related to the student, such as the student's school, the line, and promotion status (if a document was issued for previous years), will appear. The certificate/statement to be issued is selected, and the button to issue the document is pressed. Finally, the Open Document button is pressed to open the document [doc1].
